trans-unit.source: Delete a task from a job
trans-unit.target: Delete a task from a job

trans-unit.source: Delete a task from the specified job.
trans-unit.target: Delete a task from the specified job.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to tasks.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to tasks.

trans-unit.source: Replace {job-id} with the id of the job that is associated with the task.
trans-unit.target: Replace {job-id} with the id of the job that is associated with the task.

trans-unit.source: Replace {task-id} with the id of the task that you want to delete.
trans-unit.target: Replace {task-id} with the id of the task that you want to delete.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: When a task is deleted, all of the files in its directory on the compute node where it ran are also deleted (regardless of the retention time).
trans-unit.target: When a task is deleted, all of the files in its directory on the compute node where it ran are also deleted (regardless of the retention time).
